function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reliance on herd immunity as a control strategy for contagious diseases","Impact":"Continued spread of the disease and high risk to vulnerable individuals","Mitigation":"Implementing vaccination programs and non-pharmaceutical interventions","Technologies":"Vaccine development and distribution, public health measures","People":"General population, vulnerable individuals","Owner":"Health authorities, government agencies"},{"Description":"Variability in the percentage of recovered patients required for herd immunity","Impact":"Ineffective control strategies and ongoing transmission of the disease","Mitigation":"Customizing strategies based on specific population characteristics and transmission dynamics","Technologies":"Epidemiological modeling, data analysis","People":"Epidemiologists, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Differences in herd immunity estimates among countries","Impact":"Inconsistent control measures and varying levels of protection across populations","Mitigation":"Collaborative international research and data sharing, tailored intervention strategies","Technologies":"Global health surveillance, data sharing platforms","People":"International health organizations, research institutions","Owner":"Global health coalitions, research institutions"}]}
